job_name.description: The name of a job being performed. A job is an instance of a workflow

parent_job_ref.description: Reference to a parent job. Only filled in child jobs

inactive_items.description: A list of strings representing URNs and identifiers of items that should be made inactive for delivery

maxNumberOfTries.description: The maximum number of tries for the current step

numberOfTries.description: The number of tries for the current step, this must be reset to 0 each time the job moves onto the next step

current_step.description: The step number of the current step

step_number.description: The number of this step in the workflow order

task_name.description: The name of the task to be completed in this step

worker_type.description: The worker responsible for the task, the worker will listen to the queue that matches the worker type

job_status.description: The state of the entire job

previous_step_status.description: The status of the previous step

context.description: The data necessary and expected for the particular workflow
